   Description  |
________________|
_______________________________________________________________
Angels come to Earth to find a human soul that can end the war |
in heaven. Humans are caught up in this battle and must find a |
way to stop the angel Gabriel before he takes the soul back    |
from where the angel Simon has hidden it.                      |
